Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you're home, right? I'm coming
in.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, my Princess. I'm here to celebrate
your birthday. Let's spend some quality
time together.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Check it out, <MYNAME>. Impressive, huh?
You can eat all you like today.
<PAGE>
Let's eat, come on.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Phew. That's everything tidied away.
<PAGE>
You look pretty happy. Glad that I
celebrated with you? My cute little
Princess.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Now then, Princess. Here's your birthday
present. Take good care of it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I love you, Princess. I'll say all the
sweet things you want to hear tonight.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good evening. I'm coming in.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, let's celebrate your birthday!
I've made some food, let's eat it all
together!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've tried really hard, because it's
such a special day!
<PAGE>
We don't want it to get cold so let's
start eating!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I've finished tidying up!
<PAGE>
You've been smiling the whole night,
haven't you? I'm glad you enjoyed
yourself. I did too!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, happy birthday! Here's my gift
to you. I hope you can make use of it!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, I love you. Thank you so much
for simply being you!
<PAGE>
Let's celebrate like this again next
year, and the year after that, and the
one after that too!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, hello! I'm coming in.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, it's your birthday today.
Let's celebrate it together.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I worked pretty hard to get all of this
ready. What do you think?
<PAGE>
I'll want to hear what you think
afterward! Let's eat.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Right, that's everything all
tidied away!
<PAGE>
You looked so happy while you were
eating, which makes me happy too!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here you are, <MYNAME>. My present. I hope
it proves useful!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Seeing you smile like that has made all
my hard work today pay off. Happy
birthday, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good evening. Please allow me to
intrude.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
As today marks your birthday, I have
prepared a special meal for us. Can we
celebrate together?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've put my all into making this. Please
eat as much as you like!
<PAGE>
Let's eat. Please, go ahead.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for waiting. I've tidied
everything away.
<PAGE>
It looks like you enjoyed the food
today, which gives me pleasure too.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, happy birthday!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, I love you. Let's stay together
forever!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today is your birthday, right? I've
thrown a meal together, so will you
share it with me?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I made it all myself. I've tried it all,
too, so I think it tastes okay...
<PAGE>
Right! Let's dig in and find out.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've finished tidying up. 
<PAGE>
From the look on your face, you enjoyed
yourself. Phew, I'm glad.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here you go, <MYNAME>. Your present. It's
nothing extravagant, but please take it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I know I never really say this, but I'll
make an exception today. I love you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you here? I'm coming in.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I thought maybe we could celebrate your
birthday together? Would you like that?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What do you think, <MYNAME>? I tried to
plan something you'd like.
<PAGE>
Let me know what you think after we've
eaten. Let's eat.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've finished tidying up. 
<PAGE>
You looked so happy all the way through
the meal, <MYNAME>! I'm glad I made the
effort.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, happy birthday. Here's my gift
for you. I hope you like it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I think I enjoyed this almost as much as
you did!
<PAGE>
I love you, <MYNAME>. Let's do this again
next year!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good evening. I'm coming in!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I hope you're not too tired. As
it's your birthday today I wanted to
celebrate with you!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well? Well? Surprised? You can eat all
you like today! 
<PAGE>
So let's eat!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks for waiting! I've finished
tidying up.
<PAGE>
I'm so glad you enjoyed the meal!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here's your present! I hope you'll
treasure it always.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Thanks for always cheering me up!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I love you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good evening. Sorry to barge
in!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Were you waiting for me, <MYNAME>? Today
is your birthday, so let's celebrate
together!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Surprised? I really tried hard because
today is so special! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
Let's eat before it gets cold.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
There, all tidied up.
<PAGE>
I'm so happy you enjoyed yourself!
All the hard work was worth it!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here's your present! I picked it out
especially for you. Take good care of
it. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. I love you! <RED>∀</RED>
Stay by my side always!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you home? I'm coming in.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's celebrate your birthday. I've got
some food with me... so let's eat it
together?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's a special day, so I made a lot...
I hope you like it...
<PAGE>
Let's eat. Come on!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
All cleared away... You look so happy,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
It was a lot of work, but it was worth
it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>. This is your
birthday present. I hope you can use it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>. I love you. I'm so glad we
were able to celebrate like this...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's Iroha. I'm coming in.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I know that today is your
birthday, correct? Shall we celebrate it
together?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
As it's a celebration, I've worked
pretty hard on all this.
<PAGE>
Let's eat before it gets cold.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sorry to keep you waiting. I've finished
tidying everything up.
<PAGE>
I didn't think you would be quite so
happy! I'm so glad.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, here is your present from me.
Please make good use of it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm so glad we got to celebrate
together like this. I love you, <MYNAME>.
Let's do this again next year!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, good evening. Here I come!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I hope you're not too tired.
This is what you've been waiting for! <RED>∀</RED>
Let's celebrate your birthday!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I worked really hard on this, as it's
a special occasion. Please eat your
fill!
<PAGE>
Shall we get started?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I'm finished cleaning up.
<PAGE>
You look satisfied with tonight's
feast. I'm so happy! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here you are, <MYNAME>. Happy birthday!
It isn't much, but please accept this
gift.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Please stay the same sweet, dear <MYNAME>
for all the years to come! <RED>∀</RED> I love
you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, welcome back! I've been
waiting for you.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ta-da! It's your birthday today, so I
thought we could share a meal.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, it was no trouble! I am more than
capable of throwing something like this
together.
<PAGE>
Come then, let us eat before it gets
cold.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've cleaned everything up. Wow, you
look happy!
<PAGE>
I guess the food tonight was rather
good, wasn't it! Definitely worth all
the effort I went to.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here you are, little <MYNAME>! A lovely
present just for you. Make good use of
it!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I admit, I do quite like you, <MYNAME>.
If I feel like it, maybe we'll celebrate
again next year?

It was a wonderful birthday. Tomorrow
it's back to work!
